AURZA Sizes

Our dresses are designed to fit the following size bodies perfectly:

  AURZA Size
Measurement  (units)Size 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8
bust (cm) 82 85 88 93 98.5 104 109.5 115
waist (cm) 65 67 70 76 82 88 94 100
hips (cm) 87 89 92 98 104 110 116 120

Thanks to some clever designs and fabric choices all of our sizes have a little stretch and so if you are struggling our advice is as follows

  1. If you are up to half way between sizes, choose the smaller size as generally our designs are meant to have a tight & sassy fit e.g bust 90cm choose size 3 not 4
  2. If you are half way or over between sizes, choose the larger size otherwise you may experience seam slippage from the dress being too tight eg bust 91cm choose size 4
  3. If your top and bottom half fall into 2 separate sizes it is really important that you provide your measurements so we can create an improved fit e.g. bust 94 and waist 72

Please note that as AURZA is an international brand based on a unique size system that reflects the modern woman’s form, we have deliberately chosen NOT to use any reference to UK / US standard sizing. This is because through our development work we realized that there really is no consistency across brands or countries with a ‘size 12’ and using this terminology ultimately resulted in our customers choosing the wrong sizes, where as if you provide your size details we are much more likely to get it right first time for you. If you have any problems measuring yourself or choosing the right size for you please email Stephanie@aurza.com for further guidance and we will get back to you within 24 hours.

How to measure yourself

We want your clothes to have a sassy fit, but it's important not to pull the tape measure too tightly when measuring. It is often easier to get a friend to help you.

BUST - Wear the bra you would expect to be wearing with the dress and relax your arms at side. Pull the tape across fullest part of the bust and keep straight. Keep one finger under the tape measure.

WAIST - Find the natural waist by tilting sideways ("I'm a little teapot...") - the point of the body which creases is where the waist lies.

HIPS - Find the widest part of the hips, about 9 inches below the waistline.

Christina
Doloman Dress
HKD 2,200
Customize Choose Size

Perfect for curves whilst amazingly comfortable at the same time, the doloman top can be paired with any skirt.

Its pleated shoulders result in beautiful draping lines and provide a looser fit. Keep it simple with a straight pencil or add a killer kick with the ruffle at the back.

Fabric & Care

Viscose/polyester/elastane crepe for ultimate breathability, drape, softness. and easy care.

Twisted yarns provide extra stretch and comfort. Faux leather option also has inherent stretch in the fabric.

Crepe fabric - machine wash cold, delicate. Dry cleanable. Do not tumble dry, low iron. Faux leather cold wash only, do not tumble dry or iron.

Choose your size

Select the size of your DRESS:

Size chart

At AURZA we use our expertise to combine our 3D developed patterns and YOUR measurements to give you a superior fit. All you need to do is provide 4 basic measurements and / or choose the size* that you think is best for you. All size and design customisations are included in the price.

Tell us your measurements:

Use our how to measure guide

* Please note, from our extensive testing, simply providing 4 key measurements significantly improves our ability to perfect your dress. It takes only 5 minutes, is really easy to do and guidance on how to measure can be found here. If once you have submitted your measurements we feel we need any additional information, we will contact you immediately.

** Creating garments with measurements greater or smaller than our current size chart may still be possible depending on the design chosen however please email us directly for information at info@aurza.com
